translation.en: And he was a big guy. Like, he was mammoth, you know?
translation.zh:
‎他是个大块头
‎像头猛犸象 你知道吗？

translation.en: He kind of flung me around like I was like a rag doll.
translation.zh: ‎他把我像布娃娃一样扔来扔去

translation.en: When I first met Shane, I thought that he was a friend of Sarma's from school
translation.zh:
‎当我第一次见到谢恩时
‎我以为他是萨尔玛学校的朋友

translation.en: because that's how he was introduced to me.
translation.zh: ‎因为他就是这样被介绍给我的

translation.en: She came to me and told me her cousin was going to come and visit.
translation.zh:
‎她过来跟我说她的表弟
‎要过来拜访一下

translation.en: And the person who showed up was Shane. Somehow they did not seem like cousins.
translation.zh:
‎结果出现的人是谢恩
‎他们看起来并不像表亲

translation.en: Their relationship was awkward. It was hard to pin down.
translation.zh: ‎这种关系很尴尬 很难去解释清楚

translation.en: He didn't seem like he fit in,
translation.zh: ‎他们看起来不太合适

translation.en: at least not, like, first impressions, no.
translation.zh: ‎至少第一印象上 不是

translation.en: But then, it was that weird thing of like…
translation.zh: ‎但是之后 这种奇怪的事情就…

translation.en: We found his Twitter and he had 50,000 followers,
translation.zh: ‎我们找到了他的推特 他有5万粉丝

translation.en: and Alec Baldwin's tweeting at him.
translation.zh:
‎然后亚历克·鲍德温在推特上
‎跟他互动

translation.en: And you're like, "Okay, maybe they are in the same world."
translation.zh:
‎你会觉得
‎“好吧 也许他们是一个世界的人"

translation.en: [Bonnie] All of us at the restaurant were asking these questions, like,
translation.zh: ‎餐馆里的所有人都在问这些问题

translation.en: "Okay, who is he?" And at the same time,
translation.zh:
‎“好吧 他是谁？” ‎同时 我对他很友好
‎是因为他很有趣 我只是觉得

translation.en: I was being friendly with him because he was funny, and I just thought,
translation.zh:
‎同时 我对他很友好
‎是因为他很有趣 我只是觉得

translation.en: "Okay. This is a unique pairing, fine. So…" [chuckles]
translation.zh: ‎“好吧 这是独特的一对 所以…”

translation.en: Who am I to judge?
translation.zh: ‎我能说什么呢？

translation.en: But it was just all very mysterious.
translation.zh: ‎但是看起来一切都很神秘

translation.en: And Sarma didn't really tell us either what was going on.
translation.zh:
‎萨尔玛也没有告诉我们
‎整件事情是怎么回事

translation.en: So the mystery just… It was all just mystery, that we're like,
translation.zh:
‎所以这种神秘感就…
‎整件事都很神秘 我们就想着

translation.en: "Okay, we'll just go with this. It's super weird."
translation.zh: ‎“好吧 我们只好妥协 这太奇怪了”

translation.en: He was always very mysterious about who he was,
translation.zh: ‎他总是关于自己的来历遮遮掩掩

translation.en: what his occupation was.
translation.zh: ‎关于他的职业是什么

translation.en: He was involved in some sort of like black ops.
translation.zh: ‎他参与过一些黑色行动

translation.en: Stuff that's under the radar that nobody writes about
translation.zh: ‎一些暗中执行的无人知晓的机密

translation.en: that's kind of unofficial.
translation.zh: ‎这种非官方的行动

translation.en: And he would never answer anything directly and made me almost feel like
translation.zh:
‎他任何问题都不直接回答
‎这让我觉得

translation.en: for my own protection, I shouldn't ask.
translation.zh: ‎出于对我自己的保护 我不该多问

translation.en: His computer was very password protected.
translation.zh: ‎他的电脑被密码严格保护着

translation.en: I would walk in, and he would hide something.
translation.zh:
‎我有时走进来
‎他会突然隐藏什么东西

translation.en: Or upon his laptop, it was like a seal
translation.zh: ‎在他的笔记本桌面上 有一个图章

translation.en: that looked like it was a seal of the CIA or something,
translation.zh:
‎那看起来像是
‎中央情报局的标志之类的

translation.en: and he had to put in a passcode.
translation.zh: ‎他必须输入密码来进入

translation.en: I walked in one time, and there was some drone footage that he had to review.
translation.zh:
‎有一次我走进来时
‎他在看一段无人机录像

translation.en: We referenced traveling, and being in various places,
translation.zh:
‎我们提到过旅行
‎还有去过的不同地方

translation.en: and he referred to having an assistant and a driver.
translation.zh: ‎他提到了他有一位助手和一位司机

translation.en: He would wear a Rolex. I saw him in a Bentley at one point.
translation.zh:
‎他戴着一块劳力士
‎我有一次看到他坐在一辆宾利里

translation.en: [Sarma] One time, we drove into Midtown, and he had me sit in the car.
translation.zh:
‎有一次 我们开车去中城
‎他让我坐在车里

translation.en: He went into some building and then came out a while later,
translation.zh:
‎他走进了什么建筑
‎过了一会儿才出来

translation.en: and he had like a little… one of those tiny manila envelopes
translation.zh: ‎他拿着一个小的…一个小马尼拉信封

translation.en: full of loose diamonds.
translation.zh: ‎装满了裸钻

translation.en: It was sort of implied that it came from some evidence locker.
translation.zh: ‎他暗示我说这来自某个证物柜

translation.en: [man] I got the impression he was very wealthy.
translation.zh: ‎你知道 我有一种他很有钱的印象

translation.en: I didn't ask him, "So, how much money do you have?"
translation.zh: ‎我没问过他：“所以 你有多少钱？”

translation.en: I tiptoed around the question to asking sort of what his career was,
translation.zh: ‎我绕过这个问题 去问他职业是什么

translation.en: what did he do for a living, and then that's how I got the answer.
translation.zh:
‎他是做什么工作的
‎然后我就这样得到了回答

translation.en: Okay. It was black ops. And I tried to probe a little bit.
translation.zh:
‎好吧 是黑色行动
‎我尝试进一步试探他

translation.en: Uh, I said, "Do you mean like Blackwater?"
translation.zh:
‎我说：“你的意思是
‎像黑水行动那样吗？”

translation.en: And he said, "Oh, yeah, yeah, that's… It's like that."
translation.zh:
‎然后他说
‎“哦 是的 那个…跟那个差不多”

translation.en: [Bonnie] I kind of thought, like, "I don't wanna know too, too much about…
translation.zh: ‎我就想着：“我可不想知道太多…

translation.en: whatever they've got going on or… him."
translation.zh: ‎不管他们或者他是做什么的”

translation.en: But that was fine 'cause he didn't want to reveal too much, it seemed like, anyway.
translation.zh:
‎但是没关系的 因为他不想透露太多
‎反正看起来是这样

translation.en: One night at the bar, though,
translation.zh: ‎有一天在吧台

translation.en: he said to me, "Bonnie, I just want to get out of the mud and blood."
translation.zh:
‎他对我说：“邦妮
‎我只是想逃脱泥泞的战场”

translation.en: [Sarma] There was something he said once about,
translation.zh: ‎还有一次他是这么说

translation.en: "I do what I do so people like you can sleep at night."
translation.zh:
‎“我尽忠职守
‎所以你们在夜里才能安然入眠”

translation.en: Like in an almost superhero-ish, like, out in the middle of the night
translation.zh: ‎就像是超级英雄一样 在深夜里

translation.en: he'd go conquer the evil forces.
translation.zh: ‎他去战胜邪恶的力量

translation.en: It was this underworld that he was connected to,
translation.zh: ‎感觉他和地下社会有联系

translation.en: and super elusive and, like, vague and, like, you know, confusing.
translation.zh:
‎非常难以捉摸、含糊不清
‎你知道的 让人困惑

translation.en: [Allen] This idea that he had this background in the spy agencies or in the military,
translation.zh: ‎认为他有着间谍机构或者军方的背景

translation.en: in and of itself is impossible to disprove, right?
translation.zh: ‎这根本就是没法证伪的 对吧？

translation.en: You can look up if he was in the army or something,
translation.zh: ‎你可以去查他是否在军队服役

translation.en: but there's no, like, database where you can look up secret agents.
translation.zh:
‎但是根本就没有什么数据库
‎能让你查到一个秘密特工

translation.en: [Sarma] I did feel like I was in a relationship with him.
translation.zh: ‎我感觉自己和他确立了关系

translation.en: But he lived in Massachusetts. He was sort of in and out.
translation.zh:
‎但是 你知道 他住在马萨诸塞州
‎有点算是异地

translation.en: I wouldn't hear from him for a couple of days.
translation.zh: ‎我有时会好几天没有他的消息

translation.en: And then he'd be back,
translation.zh: ‎然后他会回来

translation.en: and I'd be relieved to hear from him again.
translation.zh: ‎我重新听到他的消息才会放心

translation.en: But I was always confused and sort of trying to figure things out.
translation.zh:
‎但是我总是很疑惑
‎想弄清楚事情怎么回事

translation.en: I don't remember the first time he asked me
translation.zh: ‎我不记得第一次他要求我

translation.en: to give him cash,
translation.zh: ‎给他现金是什么时候

translation.en: but at some point, he did.
translation.zh: ‎但是有一次 他这样要求了

translation.en: He suddenly needed whatever it was, six thousand, ten thousand dollars.
translation.zh: ‎他突然需要用钱 六万、十万美元

translation.en: Right away, he just needed it.
translation.zh: ‎突然间 他急需用钱

translation.en: It was like life or death. He had to have it.
translation.zh: ‎好像攸关生死一样 他必须拿到钱

translation.en: I was… It's my nature to be like, "Oh, yes. Please, let me help." [laughs]
translation.zh:
‎就像是…很自然地我就答应了
‎“哦 好的 来吧 让我帮你”

translation.en: I don't know. So, um…
translation.zh: ‎我不知道 所以…

translation.en: So, whatever it was, I gave him what he asked for.
translation.zh: ‎所以 不管是什么 我都满足他的要求

translation.en: [Ilze] Sarma is unbelievably generous.
translation.zh: ‎萨尔玛难以置信地慷慨

translation.en: When I was in university, Sarma was 14, so she came up to visit.
translation.zh:
‎我在上大学的时候 萨尔玛14岁
‎所以有一次她来看我

translation.en: And in Montreal, there were a lot of young people
translation.zh: ‎在蒙特利尔 有很多年轻人

translation.en: who were quasi-homeless and on the street,
translation.zh: ‎他们无家可归、流落街头

translation.en: and she was just giving money to everybody.
translation.zh: ‎每个人她都给钱

translation.en: [chuckles] She was walking down the sidewalk,
translation.zh: ‎她会走过人行道

translation.en: and she was so sort of taken by all these people in need.
translation.zh: ‎所有这些需要帮助的人都朝她要了钱

translation.en: And I had to say,
translation.zh: ‎我只能把她拉到一边 跟她说

translation.en: "Sarma, you can't give money to every person."
translation.zh: ‎“萨尔玛 你不能每个人都给钱”

translation.en: "We're out on Saturday night. Give money to a few people."
translation.zh:
‎“我们每周六晚上都会出来
‎力所能及给一部分人钱”

translation.en: She was just really touched, I guess, by what she saw.
translation.zh:
‎她应该是对她看到的东西
‎感到很触动

translation.en: I've known Sarma for about nine years because Leon's nine.
translation.zh:
‎我认识萨尔玛差不多九年
‎因为里昂现在九岁

translation.en: I watch everybody goes by. I try to make eye contact with everybody.
translation.zh:
‎我看着大家经过
‎我会尝试跟每个人对视

translation.en: One day, she went by and, like, our eyes connected and she smiled.
translation.zh:
‎有一天 她路过这里
‎我们对视了一下 她朝我微笑

translation.en: And I just… did that, you know what I mean?
translation.zh:
‎我就是…这样认识了她
‎你知道我的意思吗？

translation.en: And we started talking.
translation.zh: ‎然后我们开始聊天

translation.en: So she told me, you know, some things about herself,
translation.zh:
‎所以她告诉我 你知道
‎一些关于她自己的事情

translation.en: and I told her the reason why I was homeless.
translation.zh: ‎我告诉了她 为什么我沦落街头

translation.en: From there, it just became a really good friendship.
translation.zh: ‎从此以后 我们建立了深厚的友谊

translation.en: Sarma started bringing around this man that she said she had met on the street,
translation.zh:
‎萨尔玛开始把这个人带过来
‎她说她在街上遇到的这个人

translation.en: who kind of took a liking to Leon, her dog.
translation.zh: ‎他很喜欢里昂 她的狗

translation.en: And so Anthony just kind of…
translation.zh: ‎所以安东尼算是…

translation.en: He would come by and hang out with Sarma in the garden. They'd have lunch.
translation.zh:
‎他会过来陪萨尔玛在公园里走走
‎他们会一起吃午饭

translation.en: He ended up coming to one of our staff Thanksgivings.
translation.zh:
‎他最后在一个感恩节
‎来到了我们的员工聚餐

translation.en: I respect Sarma because she gets along with everybody.
translation.zh:
‎我尊敬萨尔玛
‎因为她跟每个人相处得都很好

translation.en: She would put my stuff in her apartment.
translation.zh: ‎她会把我的东西放到她的公寓

translation.en: Yeah, she would store my winter clothes, so I didn't have to have it all summer.
translation.zh:
‎对 她会帮我把冬衣存放起来
‎这样我不用夏天一直拿着

translation.en: She put something into my heart that nobody else ever did.
translation.zh: ‎她走进了我的内心 没有人做到过

translation.en: -Yeah. -[interviewer] What is that?
translation.zh:
‎-是的
‎-什么意思？

translation.en: I can't explain.
translation.zh: ‎我无法解释

translation.en: -[interviewer] Try. -I just can't explain it.
translation.zh:
‎-尝试一下
‎-我就是无法解释

translation.en: Nobody can make me do that.
translation.zh: ‎没有人让我这样过

translation.en: Don't ask me to try.
translation.zh: ‎别要求我尝试了

translation.en: Some things got to be secret, right?
translation.zh: ‎有些事情还是要保密的 对吧？

translation.en: The first time I saw Shane,
translation.zh: ‎我第一次见到谢恩时

translation.en: he was slumped in a chair in her apartment.
translation.zh: ‎是在她公寓里 他瘫在椅子上

translation.en: I said my usual, "If you need me, don't hesitate to call me."
translation.zh:
‎我像往常一样说：“如果需要我
‎直接打给我就行 不用犹豫”

translation.en: And he stuck his fat head out and said,
translation.zh: ‎然后他抬起大肥脑袋说

translation.en: "She's got me. That's why I'm here," and smiled at me.
translation.zh:
‎“她有我呢 所以我才在这儿”
‎然后冲着我微笑

translation.en: Didn't introduce himself.
translation.zh: ‎都没跟我介绍过他自己

translation.en: I left the apartment…
translation.zh: ‎我离开了公寓…

translation.en: with, like, the hairs on the back of my neck standing up,
translation.zh: ‎我后背的汗毛都竖起来了

translation.en: saying, "Who the fuck was that?"
translation.zh: ‎我想说：“那家伙到底是谁？”

translation.en: Nothing nice about him.
translation.zh: ‎对他没什么好印象

translation.en: And that's where the red flag started popping up.
translation.zh: ‎就是在这时候 我对他警惕起来

translation.en: Friends of mine that worked over at the corporate office,
translation.zh: ‎我在公司办公室工作的朋友们

translation.en: he was over there more often, and they were so wary of him.
translation.zh: ‎他更经常去那里 他们对他非常警惕

translation.en: One time he called, and it was him,
translation.zh: ‎有一次他打来电话 是他没错

translation.en: but the caller ID said, "Anthony Strangis."
translation.zh:
‎但是联系人却显示是
‎“安东尼·斯特兰吉斯”

translation.en: We had never heard that name before.
translation.zh: ‎我们从来没听过这个名字

translation.en: So we were kind of curious as to what it was.
translation.zh: ‎所以我们很好奇这个名字是怎么回事

translation.en: Um, and we googled Anthony Strangis.
translation.zh: ‎然后我们谷歌了安东尼·斯特兰吉斯

translation.en: First thing that shows up is his mug shot.
translation.zh: ‎首先出现的是警方拍摄的头像

translation.en: So we learned that Shane Fox was not Shane Fox,
translation.zh:
‎所以我们了解到谢恩·狐狸
‎其实并不是谢恩·狐狸

translation.en: and he was Anthony Strangis.
translation.zh: ‎他是安东尼·斯特兰吉斯

translation.en: [Joey] Other employees were talking about,
translation.zh: ‎其他的员工都议论纷纷

translation.en: you know, "He's shady. He's been in jail."
translation.zh: ‎你知道“他不像个好人 他坐过牢

translation.en: People were like looking into him. They feared him.
translation.zh: ‎大家都在调查他 他们很害怕他

translation.en: They brought that information up to Sarma,
translation.zh: ‎他们把这些信息提供给萨尔玛

translation.en: and she just…
translation.zh: ‎她只是…

translation.en: either didn't want to hear it or dismissed it.
translation.zh: ‎要么不想听 要么就驳回

translation.en: I didn't really understand.
translation.zh: ‎我真的不是很理解

translation.en: And Sarma kind of gives us like a nothing story of, you know,
translation.zh:
‎萨尔玛差不多给我们所有人一套
‎无所谓的说辞

translation.en: "It's fine. It's something that was in the past."
translation.zh: ‎“没关系的 那都是过去的事了”

translation.en: There is a part of you that's like, "Okay, you know, people make mistakes."
translation.zh:
‎你内心有部分会觉得
‎“好吧 你知道 人都会犯错”

translation.en: "I don't really know the story. I don't know what happened."
translation.zh:
‎“我也不了解全部故事
‎我不知道都发生了什么”

translation.en: Maybe this is why he came to New York,
translation.zh: ‎也许这就是为什么他来到纽约

translation.en: to help, you know, move past whatever had taken place before.
translation.zh: ‎来帮助告别过去的自己

translation.en: [Sarma] There was some arrest record with his real name and a mug shot
translation.zh: ‎有人发给了我一个逮捕记录

translation.en: that somebody sent to me.
translation.zh: ‎上面有他的真名和头像

translation.en: I think I was alarmed at first, and then he explained to me
translation.zh:
‎我记得最开始警觉了起来
‎然后他跟我解释说

translation.en: that he had had various identities,
translation.zh: ‎他有很多个身份

translation.en: and had multiple identities based on whatever he did.
translation.zh: ‎基于他所做的事 他需要多重身份

translation.en: He had some situation that had happened in Florida
translation.zh: ‎他在佛罗里达州遇到了一些情况

translation.en: that he was trying to get sorted out.
translation.zh: ‎他正在设法解决

translation.en: [interviewer] Did you, from then on, did you call him Anthony or Shane?
translation.zh: ‎从那以后 你叫他安东尼还是谢恩？

translation.en: Or how did things change?
translation.zh: ‎有什么东西改变了吗？

translation.en: You know, originally, I knew him as Shane.
translation.zh:
‎你知道 我本来
‎是以谢恩这个身份认识他的

translation.en: So I kind of thought of him as that… that way,
translation.zh: ‎所以我还是更多的

translation.en: more often.
translation.zh: ‎把他当成谢恩

translation.en: Jim and myself were, you know,
translation.zh: ‎吉姆和我自己是 你知道

translation.en: trying to allude that, you know, you have support.
translation.zh: ‎试图暗示她说 我们是支持你的

translation.en: Like, you know, if you need us to come and talk to us,
translation.zh: ‎你知道 如果你需要我们过来聊聊

translation.en: we can help you in any way, shape, or form.
translation.zh:
‎我们可以用任何方法、方式
‎或形式帮助你

translation.en: But, um, we were kind of in the dark
translation.zh: ‎但是对于他们的状况

translation.en: about what was going on with them too.
translation.zh: ‎我们一直都被蒙在鼓里

translation.en: I think after a few months, I got frustrated and angry
translation.zh:
‎我觉得在几个月后
‎我感到沮丧和愤怒

translation.en: and felt like I was no longer in a relationship with him,
translation.zh: ‎觉得我跟他没有什么火花了

translation.en: or at least from my perspective.
translation.zh: ‎至少在我看来是这样

translation.en: I don't know whether I was confused or angry or what,
translation.zh: ‎我不知道我是困惑还是愤怒什么的

translation.en: but I was just sort of fed up with all the confusion.
translation.zh: ‎我只是受够了所有的含糊不清

translation.en: I said to myself, like, "Ugh, that's it."
translation.zh: ‎我对自己说：“就这样吧”

translation.en: You know, "I'm not letting him come back. I'm not gonna see him again."
translation.zh:
‎“我不会让他回来了
‎我不想再见到他了”

translation.en: I had gone to my mother's in New Hampshire for a while.
translation.zh:
‎我去新罕布什尔州
